description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weapons of DayZ, including the Ruger pistol, the Vaiga Shotgun and a cutdown Mosin Nagant.

00:00 - Opening
00:32 - Blaze Double-Barreled Rifle
01:33 - AUR A1
03:38 - LAR Battle Rifle
04:55 - Ruger
07:10 - Mosin Nagant Bolt-Action Rifle
09:37 - P1 Semi-Auto Pistol
11:01 - Vaiga Shotgun
13:27 - CR-61 Skorpion
16:09 - SK 59/66
17:14 - VSS Suppressed Rifle
18:19 - SSG 82 Sniper Rifle

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down more of the guns of DayZ and compares them to their potential real-life counterparts.

Firearms Expert Reacts playlist - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y4T78VQoWUs&list=PLpg6WLs8kxGMgYb13XjPgOKbm5O-CDq7R

If you're interested in seeing more of Jonathan's work, you can check out more from the Royal Armouries right here. - htt
title: Firearms Expert Reacts To DayZ’s Guns PART 2
